Q: Why does the music occasionally skip?

– join the waiting list for sold-out events and be next in line to get tickets, or get a refund if you can no longer go
– transfer tickets to a friend if you have a spare, can’t make it or as a gift because you’re nice like that.

If you have any questions, feelings, concerns, or just want to say hi – send an email to help@dice.fm.
